Question ID 251 - Emission factors disclosure
Release date
May 2024
Question asked
Does the disclosure of emission factors include the values in, for example, 500 gCO2e/kWh, or is
the description of the emission factor related to the source of the emission factor sufficient? Is
the reporting organisation obliged to make the calculation tools publicly accessible or is only the
access for auditors and EU/national authorities mandatory?
ESRS reference
ESRS E1 paragraph AR 39 (b)
Key Terms
